underlying_goal: The user wanted to know if the opening/closing text generation feature was fixed, and implicitly wanted it to be separated into independent checkboxes
friction_detail: User asked a simple yes/no question about whether something was fixed, but Claude spent the entire 15-minute session doing extensive codebase exploration and planning without answering directly or making any fixes.
brief_summary: User asked if a feature was fixed; Claude spent the entire session exploring the codebase and creating a plan but made no actual code changes or fixes.
